title: For an Ever After
description: For an Ever After is a collection of poems and short stories by the father-son duo - Oinam Binodkumar Singh and Suraj Kumar Oinam. They hail from the beautiful state of Manipur in the North East region of India. Since it is a land of valleys, hills and rivers, Nature is a recurring theme in their poems. Love, longing, and lifeâ€™s seasons are some other themes they have tried to explore. Those who like poetry and have an inclination towards the open landscapes should surely savor their poems.
author: Oinam Binodkumar Singh
